font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 鼓掌，认可：approval publicly expressed (as by clapping the hands)
【例】Her appearance was greeted with applause. 她的表现赢得了认可。
【近】acclamation喝彩；鼓掌欢呼表示通过, cheer, cheering, ovation大喝采, plaudit喝彩, rave赞扬的
【反】hissing, booing 发出嘘声
